desc: The SimpleSENCE™ leak and freeze sensor is an in-home, WiFi connected, multi-sensor system that instantly detects and alerts water leaks and extreme temperature variations. Available in single unit or multi-unit home packs, you can rest easy knowing you have 24/7 leak and freeze protection for your home and valuables.

layout.text: A Leak or Flood Can Be Devastating Both Emotionally and Financially
Protect Your Home and Business from Water Damage with the Full Range of Innovative Water Leak and Freeze Detector’s
